text:
- One of the mass vaccination centres is Epsom Downs Racetrack
- Epsom is owned by the Jockey Club
- @didoharding is a Jockey Club Steward(Board member)
- She is also head ofTrack and trace
- Is the @EpsomRacecourse offering facilities to the NHS free?  #vaccine #COVID19 https://t.co/D7pmPgYImt
